title: There's No Files In My Riot Games Folder

embed.description: Hey everyone, Update: 10:40am PDT > A fix was deployed, and the issue should now be resolved. Best of luck on the rift! Update: 9:40am PDT Some players might instead see a** grayed Sign In** button. The steps below should resolve that issue as well!

body:
**With a mix of Stupidity and Frustration, I have done the dumbest thing:**

OK, so it started that I couldn't play League because it said "offline" even though, as you can tell, my internet is working perfectly fine.
I followed all the different instructions on a help page, but none of t hem worked, so i thought, "maybe a simple reinstall would fix it?"

Fat chance, I couldn't even open the game now, I finished downloading and clicked the League client but the loading screen for Old League came up, then for a split second it became new, and then just never came back.

"Okay," I thought, "Maybe i have to run it as admin." so I did, and I got the same result.
Next i thought okay, lets just uninstall it, and reread all the different instructions on the help page.

As I was moving to uninstall it, my dumb self thought well maybe I can uninstall it faster by deleting the Riot Games folder.
So i threw the file in the garbage and cleaned out the bin, permanently deleting it

Well the uninstalling was faster....

but now there is no other files in the Riot folder, just the old League of Legends launchers, the RADS folder, and 2 Patcher Logs.
and League still wont open...


So, in this series of Moronic events, what do I do now?

replies.body: Hah no worries bud, this isn't quite as bad as you're thinking. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the options **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** both turned on. Let me know how that works for ya!

I had done so earlier, but there's no Leagueclient.exe Just the old Lol.Launcher.exe and the admin version.

It wont let me do the repairs without the new Leagueclient.exe

**Update:**

I Did the repairs without the new league client, same results

I did the repairs with with "Force patch" or whatever enabled, same results.


Any clue on what i can do? i'm out of options



**Update 2: Update Harder**

**Hypothesis: **Because i haven't updated to new windows yet, League wont run and this entire thing was pointless because i was lazy

**Update 3: Updater Harder-er**

It did not work.
